rows.label: qev085902_MSG0001
rows.name: So that's her, huh? And you say her name's Dorothy?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085902_MSG0002
rows.name: She's beautiful.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085902_MSG0003
rows.name: Oh, gosh. Thanks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085902_MSG0004
rows.name: Not quite sure what you're taking credit for there, but okay.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085902_MSG0005
rows.name: Tatsu will go ask pretty lady for her favorite food.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085902_MSG0006
rows.name: You stay put, you![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085902_MSG0007
rows.name: Man, she's TOO beautiful. She'll never go for a schlub like me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085902_MSG0008
rows.name: If only I could make her happy somehow...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085902_JNK0010
rows.name: Suggest

rows.label: qev085902_SEL0011
rows.name: Say he should get her a present.

rows.label: qev085902_JNK0020
rows.name: Advise

rows.label: qev085902_SEL0021
rows.name: Tell him to confess his undying love.

rows.label: qev085902_MSG0009
rows.name:
What, just out of the blue?
Shouldn't I start with dinner or something?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085902_MSG0010
rows.name:
Dinner dates are nice and all,
but any schmo can ask a girl out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085902_MSG0011
rows.name: A surprise gift? Now that'll leave an impression![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085902_MSG0012
rows.name: You sure it's not weird?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085902_MSG0013
rows.name: Unusual, maybe, but that's not necessarily bad.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085902_MSG0014
rows.name:
If the way she's dressed now is any indication,
she's obviously into fashion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085902_MSG0015
rows.name:
Why not give her a little accessory when you ask her out?
A bracelet or something.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085902_MSG0016
rows.name: That's perfect... I bet she'll love it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085902_MSG0017
rows.name: Ooh, now we're talkin'![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085902_MSG0018
rows.name: What, just out of the blue? No way![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085902_MSG0019
rows.name:
Come on, you guys, the point isn't to
send the poor woman running.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085902_MSG0020
rows.name:
All right, maybe that's a little strong.
How about just asking her to dinner?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085902_MSG0021
rows.name: Well, that's safer. But is it TOO safe?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085902_MSG0022
rows.name:
If the way she's dressed now is any indication,
she's obviously into fashion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085902_MSG0023
rows.name:
Why not give her a little accessory when you ask her out?
A bracelet or something.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085902_MSG0024
rows.name: Hey, that'll make a great impression![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085902_MSG0025
rows.name: All right, I'll give it a try![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085902_MSG0026
rows.name:
Er, but where am I supposed to find
nice jewelry here on Mira?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085902_MSG0027
rows.name:
Tatsu have an idea!
Cowardly friend should get pretty lady a shiny rock.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085902_MSG0028
rows.name: That how Tatsu dadapon win the heart of mamapon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085902_MSG0029
rows.name: Hey, not bad. You're kinda smart...for a Nopon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085902_MSG0030
rows.name: Meh! Says friend who need whole team to ask out girl![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085902_MSG0031
rows.name: What does friend think of this?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085902_MSG0032
rows.name: Oh, that's lovely.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085902_MSG0033
rows.name: It Nopon matchmaking stone![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085902_MSG0034
rows.name: Super valuable. Worth more than almost any food.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085902_MSG0035
rows.name: Sounds like a winner to me! Let's go track one down.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085902_MSG0036
rows.name: We'll need someone to set it in a bracelet once we've found it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085902_MSG0037
rows.name:
There's a jewelry shop in the commercial district.
We can try bringing it there.[ST:wait ]
